name: Security Run LD42
description:
Pulling a heist? Pfff... easy! The hard part that nobody tells you about? Escaping with all that cash! Which, conveniently, is exactly what YOU are about to do!

Run like you never ran before, shoot everything that moves and make it in time before your getaway car leaves!

Also... be sure to patch yourself up a few times during the process, those bullet-holes aren't going to heal themselves!
